name: | 1 dice 2 die | GMTK 2022 Game Jam |
description:
You are Dice T, a paranormal detective who unhaunt houses, the usual stuff, talk with the ghost and let their soul free for once!
But this time something different happens... You're going to investigate this old casino when you met a quirky ghostly figure, and she wants to gamble your soul! 

Let's see if you're good with the dice so you don't die.

A short visual novel story developed for GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice"
TO PLAY PLEASE EXECUTE "GMTK2022 geleca.exe"
